author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
Replaced boost binding for std::bind. The code should have the same behavior.
Since code format modified the whole file, I added the code format changes in a separated commit

#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

@vgvassilev @davidlange6
title: Reduce boost dependency in PhysicsTools/MVAComputer
